welcome_text: Your AI assistant for smart, multilingual and personalized decision making.
faq_how_text: e-META uses a smart form, Make and WhatsApp to generate personalized summaries.
faq_free_text: A basic version is free. Advanced features will be offered later.
about_text: e-META is designed as a decision support tool using GPT-4, WhatsApp and guided forms to help users clarify their choices in all areas.
